summary: This is an email chain from July 2, 2020, discussing operational details following the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes questions about her initial court appearance, transportation from New Hampshire to New York, and notification of the UK government due to her citizenship.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the email discussion regarding her arrest, initial appearance, and transportation; identified as a UK citizen.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Email correspondence indicates Ghislaine Maxwell has been arrested, with questions about her initial court appearance and transportation plans.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested by July 2, 2020.
Operational details were being coordinated for her initial court appearance and transportation from New Hampshire to New York.
The UK government needed to be notified of her arrest due to her UK citizenship.
